scripts.start: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.start:zoom: rm -rf dist && ng build --project video-angular-sdk --watch --configuration development & (wait-on dist && ng serve zoom-clone --host 0.0.0.0)
scripts.start:messenger: rm -rf dist && ng build --project video-angular-sdk --watch --configuration development & (wait-on dist && ng serve messenger-clone --host 0.0.0.0)
scripts.build: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.build:ci: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.test: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.lint: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.generate-docs: echo 'Angular SDK is temporarily hibernated, this command does nothing'
scripts.generate-docs:core: typedoc --options typedoc.json --exclude '!projects/video-angular-sdk/**/*(stream-video.module|video.service|device-manager.service|in-call-device-manager.service).ts' ./projects/video-angular-sdk/src/public-api.ts && replace-in-file '# Class: ' '# ' temp-docs/** && cp -a temp-docs/classes/. docusaurus/docs/Angular/core && rm -r temp-docs
scripts.generate-docs:ui-components: typedoc --options typedoc.json --exclude '!projects/video-angular-sdk/**/*.component.ts' ./projects/video-angular-sdk/src/public-api.ts && replace-in-file '# Class: ' '# ' temp-docs/** && cp -a temp-docs/classes/. docusaurus/docs/Angular/ui-components && rm -r temp-docs
